label: 漉返紙
説明文: sukigaeshi, papers made from recycled old paper, and usually having a gray color: irogami (色紙, colored paper); shukushi (also sukushi, 宿紙); and sasshi (or zōshi, 雑紙) , a low-grade paper used for face tissue.#[article]Tomita Masahiro. The Classification and Evolution of Paper Used in Medieval Documents as Soon in Written Sources.
